summary:
### February 2025 Summary for buidlguidl/ens-pg

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Completed the implementation of the USDC grants system, including the creation of a database structure, user interfaces, and integration into the homepage.
  - Merged the LargeGrant contract, enabling the addition of grants with milestones and the ability to manage grant stages and owners.
  - Established a draft schema for large grants, enhancing the existing grants framework.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - No significant bug fixes reported.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focused on developing and integrating USDC grant functionalities.
  - Emphasis on enhancing the grants management system with milestone tracking and improved user interfaces.

topIssues.title: Add USDC grants to approved grants (homepage)

topPRs.title: Add large grants schema and seed
